reviews.customers_say: Customers praise the dress's design, with one highlighting the perfection of the corset bodice details. Customers disagree on the sizing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exquisite Dress & top notch customer service!
items.body: I can't tell you how beautiful and well made this dress is, its just gorgeous! I 1st reached out to the seller to ask how to send them my measurements. The response was nearly immediate (within 30 min). I then took my measurements, my top is smaller than my bottom and sent the info. I, again, had a response within an hour. My dress came with 3 weeks! The sizing is perfect! The seams are beautiful and even. The details on the corset bodice are just perfection! This dress has far exceeded my expectation and the seller is stellar!!!!! I bought this dress for my wedding in Sept and I couldnt be happier! It can be intimidating to purchase a dress without seeing it or trying it on in person. The fast and efficient communication helped to ease my anxiety and it was so worth taking the chance! I highly recommend this unbelievable dress at an amazing price point! Read more
items.author: Renee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I ordered a size 14 and could easily have gotten away with a size 12 with it being a lace up back but I was worrisome about it being made overseas so I sized up for my concerns other than that it’s exactly what’s pictured color, design, length, and came earlier than anticipated! Read more
items.author: Hailey Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looked amazing on my daughter
items.author: ke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made
items.body: Lovely dress, very well made and absolutely beautiful! It is a little long and does not come with the corset string (we used a shoelace for review pics), but definitely worth the price. Read more
items.author: Shawna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Pink, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Rose Red, Royal Blue, Teal, Gold, Blue, Burgundy, Hot Pink, Sage Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
